mapper.select: SELECT uh.history_idx, u.username, cs.facltNm, uh.action_type, uh.action_date, uh.payment_amount, uh.created_at FROM usage_history uh JOIN users u ON uh.user_idx = u.user_idx JOIN campingsites cs ON uh.contentId = cs.contentId ORDER BY uh.action_date DESC
